comment.text: This translation key is used to display the title of a page that controls language and time zone settings, commonly found in portal settings or customization sections. It appears as a document title, typically displayed at the top of a page or dialog, guiding users to this specific configuration section.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Լեզվի և ժամային գոտու կարգավորումներ" is a literal translation of "Language and Time Zone Settings" but could be improved for naturalness.  A more idiomatic translation might be "Լեզու և ժամային գոտի" or "Լեզու և ժամային գոտու ρυθμισεις".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "Լեզու և ժամային գոտի" or "Լեզու և ժամային գոտու ρυθμισεις".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ພາສາ ແລະ ເຂດເວລາ" literally translates to "Language and Time Zone". While not entirely wrong, it lacks the full meaning of "Settings". It should convey that these are settings *related* to language and time zone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more complete translation like "ການຕັ້ງຄ່າພາສາ ແລະ ເຂດເວລາ" (Kan tang kha phasa lae khet wela) - which means 'Language and Time Zone Settings'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "භාෂාව සහ වේලා කලාපයේ සැකසුම්" is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. While the individual words are correct, the phrasing feels awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'Language and Time Zone Settings'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: භාෂාව හා කාලස Bupati සැකසුම් (Bhāṣāvā hā kālasa bupati sękäsūm) - This is a more natural phrasing meaning 'Language and Time Settings'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nastavi jezik in časovni pas' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Settings'. It translates to 'Set Language and Time Zone'. A more accurate translation, incorporating the 'Settings' context, would be something like 'Nastavitve jezika in časovne cone' or 'Jezik in nastavitve časovne cone'.

The translation 'Језик и временска зона подешавања' while technically accurate, is a bit clunky and not the most natural way to express 'Language and Time Zone Settings' in Serbian. 'Подешавања' feels a little too formal and verbose for a settings label.

The translation 'Cài đặt ngôn ngữ và múi giờ' is a functional translation but doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Language and Time Zone Settings.' While 'Cài đặt' is correct for 'Settings,' 'ngôn ngữ và múi giờ' is more literal. A more natural phrasing might be 'Ngôn ngữ và cài đặt múi giờ' or 'Thiết lập ngôn ngữ và múi giờ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Ngôn ngữ và cài đặt múi giờ' or 'Thiết lập ngôn ngữ và múi giờ'.
